caption.title: Relationship of climate change risk perception with tentative explanatory variables.
caption.p: Relationships of the belief in the local effects of climate change and having experienced the effects of climate change, taken as representing components of the perception of climate change risk, highest education level and value profile for Swedish (a) and German (b) respondents. The size of the respective compartment is proportional to the number of observations in the respective category. The graphs are based on data after imputation.; FR–Forest Rejoicers; SFU–Sustainable Forest Users; EM–Economic Maximizers; E–Environmentalists; FU–Forest Users; C–Conservationists; MBP–Mushroom and Berry Pickers; DU–Diverse Users.
Click here for additional data file.
